page.title: 05GRENDON METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: Grendon Methodist Church is situated at the bottom of Boot Hill in Grendon. This year the church is celebrating its centenary,(25th October,1985). There is a service every Sunday evening between 6pm. and 7pm.The number of people who attend the church regularly is between 25 and 30. There is a ladies class every Monday evening.There was a Sunday School which met every week until it closed last year. The church building has changed over the years.In 1983 an extension was built in the form of a new porch. During this year it has been completely redecorated internally.
